title: U.S. and China step to forefront as climate talks near end game
content:
1. U.S. and China step to forefront as climate talks near end game  POLITICO
  2. COP26: China and US agree to boost climate co-operation  BBC News
  3. U.S. and China sign agreement to work together on climate change  Yahoo News
  4. What Happened at COP26 on Wednesday: China and U.S. Say They’ll ‘Enhance’ Climate Ambition  The New York Times
  5. Takeaways from Wednesday at COP26: China and US surprise summit, negotiations heat up, car deal flops  CNN

localize.title: 米国と中国は、気候変動対策の最終段階に向けて最前線に立つ
